NameValuePair.description: External resource configuration required by the archive.

NameValuePair.name: EXTERNAL_JAR_DEPENDENCY
NameValuePair.description: External jars required by archive or its dependencies, will be added to classpath

NameValuePair.name: Trace.Task.*
NameValuePair.description: Activity Trace Controls activity invocation trace

NameValuePair.name: EnableMemorySavingMode
NameValuePair.description: Memory Saving Mode controls process variable memory saving mode

NameValuePair.name: bw.engine.enableJobRecovery
NameValuePair.description: maintain checkpoints for failed processes enables the preservation of checkpoints for process instances that end with a fault

NameValuePair.name: bw.engine.autoCheckpointRestart
NameValuePair.description: auto checkpoint restart controls automatic restarting of checkpoints when engine first starts up

NameValuePair.name: bw.engine.jobstats.enable
NameValuePair.description: maintain job history file controls maintence of job history csv file

NameValuePair.name: log.file.encoding
NameValuePair.description: set log file encoding controls log file encoding

NameValuePair.name: bw.engine.emaEnabled
NameValuePair.description: Enables Enterprise Management Advisor Interface Enables Enterprise Management Advisor driven process control based on resource state

NameValuePair.name: bw.container.service
NameValuePair.description: BW Service Container Enables BW engine to be hosted within a container

NameValuePair.name: bw.container.service.rmi.port
NameValuePair.description: BW Service Container RMI Port Enables Container Communication Port

NameValuePair.name: bw.platform.services.retreiveresources.Enabled
NameValuePair.description: Built-in Resource Provider Activation Enables Built in Resource Provider

NameValuePair.name: bw.platform.services.retreiveresources.Hostname
NameValuePair.description: Built-in Resource Provider Host Sets Built-in Resource Provider Host Name

NameValuePair.name: bw.platform.services.retreiveresources.Httpport
NameValuePair.description: Built-in Resource Provider Http Port Sets Built-in Resource Provider Http Port Number

NameValuePair.name: bw.platform.services.retreiveresources.defaultEncoding
NameValuePair.description: Built-in Resource Provider Default Encoding Sets Built-in Resource Provider defaultEncoding

NameValuePair.name: bw.platform.services.retreiveresources.enableLookups
NameValuePair.description: Built-in Resource Provider DNS Lookups Enables Built-in Resource Provider DNS Lookups

NameValuePair.name: bw.platform.services.retreiveresources.isSecure
NameValuePair.description: Built-in Resource Provider Secure Socket Layer(SSL) support Enables Built-in Resource Provider Secure Socket Layer(SSL) support

NameValuePair.name: bw.platform.services.retreiveresources.identity
NameValuePair.description: Built-in Resource Provider Identity Sets Built-in Resource Provider Identity if Secure Socket Layer(SSL) support is enabled

NameValuePair.name: bw.log4j.configuration
NameValuePair.description: Log4j Configuration File Log4j Configuration file path
